name: Suicide Adventures
description:
Lost in the abyssal depths of limbo, you are a tortured soul who is trapped between life and death, stuck in a dungeon whose puzzles will test you as you strive to go into the afterlife.

* Explore an abyssal world set in Limbo.
* Solve a variety of puzzles where your only goal is to kill yourself so you may pass through Limbo.
* Die in gruesome and horrifying ways.
* Discover the secrets of a mysterious ruin.

Obtain 5000 achievements!!!
